data.title: Become a Member
data.meta_description: Members at Japan Society enjoy exclusive benefits, invitations to special events and discounts on hundreds of performances, films, lectures and classes annually.
data.text:
Individual Members are central to what we do and why we do it. This is why you’ll always be front and center for exhibitions, series, festivals, performances and more as a member.

Members at Japan Society enjoy exclusive benefits, invitations to special events and discounts on hundreds of performances, films, lectures and classes annually. Learn more about membership levels and related perks below, or contact our Membership Office at [email protected] or (212) 715-1270 for more information

Inspired by the Japanese concept of kizuna (絆) – forging deep connections to bind people together – Giving Circles provide unrestricted support that enable Japan Society to deliver programs and events that connect its audiences around the world through Japanese arts, culture, business and society.

As a Circle member, you can designate your membership support of $1,000 or more to a program department and be a part of our Affinity Groups for Gallery, Performing Arts, Film, and Family & Education programs. By joining these groups, you are directly providing unrestricted support to our programs and providing them with resources that can be used flexibly to execute events and productions.

Giving Circle Members may choose to directly support Japan Society programs by joining one of four Affinity Groups with a minimum gift designation of $1,000. Affinity Group members are recognized as a supporter of their designated program area and invited to curated events. Please email [email protected] if you would like to join an Affinity Group.

Gallery Circle

Provide critical financial support that sustains Japan Society’s dynamic exhibitions and related lectures and workshops. Established in 1971, the Gallery is one of the few North American public venues that exclusively showcases a full spectrum of Japanese art and its influence on the global artistic scene.

ADDITIONAL PERKS: Gallery and collection visits, private exhibition viewings, studio trips with artists, and first access to art fair VIP passes.

Performing Arts Circle

Is a community of passionate theater-goers, music enthusiasts and dance lovers dedicated to Japanese performing arts. Since 1953, Japan Society has presented over 700 performances of the finest in traditional and contemporary dance, music, theater and puppetry arts. From traditional noh plays to commissioned new works from cutting-edge artists, Japan Society is committed to bringing innovative artists of the highest caliber to New York and the U.S.

ADDITIONAL PERKS: Advanced notice of performing arts outings, intimate chats and post-show toasts with artists.

Film Circle

Are avid film-lovers who celebrate the country’s rich cinematic culture. Since its first screening in 1922, the Film Program has become the leading pioneer introducing Japan’s rich and diverse films to American audiences. From retrospectives of classics by seminal film-makers, to JAPAN CUTS featuring international, U.S. and New York premieres of the most current releases, Film at Japan Society has something to enchant everyone.

ADDITIONAL PERKS: Private invitations to intimate receptions with prominent film actors, directors, and industry professionals, special screenings, among other film-related events.
